description: Baby, it`s back. The work shirt that flew out of here last year. The one you wore so often, it was almost a problem. And you did it because of that stretch. We know - we did it too. It`s hard to reach for another work shirt when you`ve got one that lets you fully embrace your work, thanks to Dovetail`s secret stretch sauce. Never boxy, always foxy. Pockets that actually serve a purpose.
name: Givens Work Shirt - Womens
